revised_title: Innervation and Mechanics of the Starfish Tube Foot-Ampulla System
tldr: This article explores the mechanics and innervation of the starfish tube foot-ampulla system, focusing on the morphology, movement, and nerve tracts involved. The study reveals the role of the central nervous system in controlling and coordinating tube foot movements, as well as the anatomy of nerve centers and tracts within the starfish.
